name: 傅子恒
objective:
本課程以互動藝術創作為目標，透過創意編程及邊緣運算兩大學習主軸，逐步引導學生進入互動藝術創作的領域。

This course targets at interactive art creation. By mastering the two main topics throughout the course including creative coding and edge computation, students will be introduced to the domain of interactive art creation.
